task.title: Add an Address
task.shortdesc: The university maintains several addresses for students in order to maintain accurate student records and information.

taskbody.prereq: Address changes are made through MyPack Portal. Users must have a functioning account

step.cmd: Find the address you wish to add (e.g. ‘Diploma Address,’ ‘Campus Housing Address,’) and click the ‘Add Address’ button.

info.note: Note: If there is already an address under the header, refer to the Update Address procedure to update the existing address.

step.cmd: Enter the address one of two ways:

choices.choice: Click ‘Copy Form’ to copy an address that is already on record
